pychell API reference¶

Forward Models¶

class pychell.rvs.forward_models.ForwardModels(config, model_blueprints, parser, order_num)¶

Bases: list

compute_nightly_rvs(iter_index)¶

Genreates individual and nightly (co-added) RVs after forward modeling all spectra and stores them in the ForwardModels object. If do_xcorr is True, nightly cross-correlation RVs are also computed.

Parameters

iter_index (int) – The iteration to generate RVs from.

cross_correlate_spectra(iter_index)¶

Cross correlation wrapper for all spectra.

Parameters

iter_index (int or None) – The iteration to use.

fit_spectra(iter_index)¶

Forward models all spectra and performs xcorr if set.

Parameters

iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

get_init_star_vel_ccf()¶

Cross correlation wrapper for all spectra.

Parameters

iter_index (int or None) – The iteration to use. If None, then it’s assumed to be a crude first guess.

plot_rvs(iter_index)¶

Plots all RVs and cross-correlation analysis after forward modeling all spectra.

Parameters

iter_index (int) – The iteration to use.

print_init_summary()¶

Print a summary for this run.

save_rvs()¶

Saves the forward model results and RVs.

sort()¶

Sort the list in ascending order and return None.

The sort is in-place (i.e. the list itself is modified) and stable (i.e. the order of two equal elements is maintained).

If a key function is given, apply it once to each list item and sort them, ascending or descending, according to their function values.

The reverse flag can be set to sort in descending order.

Model Components¶

class pychell.rvs.model_components.APrioriLSF(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.LSF

A container for an LSF known a priori.

Attr:

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.AugmentedStar(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.Star

A star model which did not start from a synthetic template.

Attr:

from_synthetic (bool): Whether or not this model started from a synthetic template or not.

Constructs a multiplicative model that uses a template.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

init_parameters(forward_model)¶

Initializes the parameters for this model

Parameters

forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.ContinuumModel(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.EmpiricalMult

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

static estimate_wobble(wave, flux, mask, poly_order=6, n_sigma=[0.3, 3.0], max_iters=50)¶

Fit the continuum using sigma clipping. This function is nearly identical to Megan Bedell’s Wobble code. :param x: The wavelengths. :param y: The log-fluxes. :param order: The polynomial order to use :param nsigma: The sigma clipping threshold: tuple (low, high) :param maxniter: The maximum number of iterations to do

Returns

The value of the continuum at the wavelengths in x in log space.

init_optimize(forward_model, templates_dict)¶

Perform initial, pre-Nelder-Mead optimizations.

Parameters

forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.EmpiricalMult(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.MultModelComponent

Base class for an empirically derived multiplicative (or log-additive) spectral component (i.e., based purely on parameters, no templates involved). As of now, this is purely a node in the Type heirarchy and provides no unique functionality.

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.HermiteLSF(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.LSF

A Hermite Gaussian LSF model. The model is a sum of Gaussians of constant width and Hermite Polynomial coefficients.

hermdeg¶

The degree of the hermite model. Zero corresponds to a pure Gaussian.

Type

int

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

Parameters

forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.HybridWavelengthSolution(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.WavelengthSolution

Class for a wavelength solution which starts from some pre-derived solution (say a ThAr lamp), with the option of an additional spline offset if further constrained by a gas cell.

n_splines¶

The number of wavelength splines.

Type

int

splines_enabled¶

Whether or not the splines are enabled.

Type

bool

spline_pixel_set_points¶

The location of the spline knots.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.LSF(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.SpectralComponent

A base class for an LSF (line spread function) model.

dl¶

The step size of the high resolution fidicual wavelength grid the model is convolved on. Must be evenly spaced.

Type

float

nx_model¶

The number of model pixels in the high resolution fidicual wavelength grid.

Type

float

nx¶

The number of points in the lsf grid.

Type

int

x¶

The lsf grid.

Type

np.ndarray

default_lsf¶

The default LSF to use or start from. Defaults to None.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.PolyContinuum(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.ContinuumModel

Blaze transmission model through a polynomial and/or splines, ideally used after a flat field correction or after remove_continuum but not required.

The polynomial order.

Type

int

n_splines¶

The number of wavelength splines.

Type

int

blaze_wave_estimate¶

The estimate of the blaze wavelegnth. If not provided, defaults to the average of the wavelength grid provided in the build method.

Type

bool

The location of the spline knots.

Type

np.ndarray

update(forward_model, iter_index)¶

Updates this model component given the iteration index and the n_delay attribute. This function may be extended / re-implmented for each model.

Parameters

  • forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

  • iter_index (int) – The iteration index.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.SpectralComponent(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: object

Base class for a general spectral component model.

blueprint¶

The blueprints to construct this component from.

Type

dict

order_num¶

The image order number.

Type

int

enabled¶

Whether or not this model is enabled.

Type

bool

n_delay¶

The number of iterations to delay this model component.

Type

int

name¶

The name of this model.

Type

str

base_par_names¶

The base parameter names of the parameters for this model.

Type

str

par_names¶

The full parameter names are name + _ + base_par_names.

Type

str

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.TelluricsTAPAS(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.Tellurics

A telluric model based on Templates obtained from TAPAS. These templates should be pre-fetched from TAPAS and specific to the observatory. Only water has a unique depth, with all others being identical. The model uses a common Doppler shift.

species¶

The names (strings) of the telluric species.

Type

list

n_species¶

The number of telluric species.

Type

int

species_enabled¶

A dictionary with species as keys, and boolean values for items (True=enabled, False=disabled)

Type

dict

species_input_files¶

A list of input files (strings) for the individual species.

Type

list

Constructs a multiplicative model that uses a template.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The dictionary needed to construct this model component.

  • wave_bounds (list) – A list of the approximate min and max wavelength bounds.

  • order_num (int, optional) – The order number. Defaults to None.

init_optimize(forward_model, templates_dict)¶

Perform initial, pre-Nelder-Mead optimizations.

Parameters

forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

init_parameters(forward_model)¶

forward_model (ForwardModel) – The forward model this model belongs to.

class pychell.rvs.model_components.WavelengthSolution(forward_model, blueprint)¶

Bases: pychell.rvs.model_components.SpectralComponent

A base class for a wavelength solution (i.e., conversion from pixels to wavelength).

pix_bounds¶

The left and right pixel bounds which correspond to wave_bounds.

Type

list

nx¶

The total number of data pixels.

Type

int

default_wave_grid¶

The default wavelength grid to use or start from.

Type

np.ndarray

Base initialization for a model component.

Parameters

  • blueprint (dict) – The blueprints to construct this component from.

  • order_num (int) – The image order number.
